attributes.action: BBC Scotland Continual harassment against Rangers chairman Craig Whyte
attributes.additional_details:
I as a Rangers supporter have found that BBC Scotland's continual negative press against my club Glasgow Rangers is now completely unacceptable and a full inquiry should now be undertaken to identify why I as a license payer should accept this type of negative biased journalism. This is nothing short of a witch hunt against a great Institution , such negative press such as potraying Rangers legend Alastair McCoist as a bigot is one example of many occurrences this year.

I as Licencee payer expect better from an organisation I used to hold in high regard.
